column24: Fun. Plateaued. Tons of cross court extreme shots. Low %
Improved. Trying to be really aggresive.
60+. Flat hitter with crazy crosscourt forehand
Lefty. Smart player and good at net
Played a lot, but needs to up game

column22: Real casual game. I just tried to get th eball back in and it wasn't super serious
The team started lobbing at us. I need to learn how to get more aggressive when that's happening.
Tried to be real soft against 3.0 players. Not competitive. Serve was the FH Long error

column18: ? Long + Net errors = 48% of all mistakes
? TOO MUCH TOPSPIN on punch/push shots (dinks, drops, resets)
? Apply 'Punch vs Brush' framework: push soft shots, topspin power shots
You win longer rallies (7.3 vs 6.6 shots) - patience WORKS for you!
